job_description:
1. Checking documents received from Accounting and stamping the date of receipt of the document.
2. Updating the shared folder with the status of documents received by Treasury.
3. Sorting and effectively grouping the documents that will be prepared for the weekly document processing according to the payment schedule.
4. Stamping the payment date on the check voucher and its supporting documents.
5. Preparing a document receipt for document transfer to Accounting.
6. Filing the necessary documents.
